tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE video_archives (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    video_title VARCHAR(255),
    video_description TEXT,
    video_duration TIME,
    video_source_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE BroadcastLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date DATE,
    log_time TIME,
    broadcast_channel VARCHAR(50),
    broadcast_duration INT,
    log_description TEXT
);
